content:
Hey Chat! I am working on R Studio with a csv file named "Supermarketdata" that has columns for Store Number (with its column name being "Store"), Department Number (with its column name being "Dept"), Date (with its column name being "year") and Weekly Sales (with its column name being "Weekly\_Sales")

Build a code that can: 
1. Print what is the distribution of average weekly sales per store for 2012 in a friendly-reading manner and,
2. Create a Box Plot to display this information and visually identifies where Store number 10 is in the plot?Share Prompt
